definition: palace/temple/castration (as corporal punishment)/first note in pentatonic scale
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

sentences.english: First things first, use whole sign houses.
Today marks Mercury's turnaround and direct motion and it will be transiting your sign.
sentences.chinese: 今天，水星转向并恢复顺行，在你的宫位内。

sentences.english: Whether a planet is in good or bad state, it will realize the affairs of the house.
sentences.chinese: 行星态势的好坏，会影响到其落入宫位所代表的领域。

sentences.english: Saturn is now back for a good long stay in your Mind Zone.
sentences.chinese: 土星现在回到你的思想宫位并会待一段时间。

sentences.english: Ideally, we should have one planet in every sign, and in the RIGHT sign as well.
sentences.chinese: 从理想上来说，每个行星都该落入一个合适的宫位。

definition: the twelve equatorial constellations or signs of the zodiac in Western astronomy and astrology, namely: Aries 白羊[Bai2 yang2], Taurus 金牛[Jin4 niu2], Gemini 雙子|双子[Shuang1 zi3], Cancer 巨蟹[Ju4 xie4], Leo 獅子|狮子[Shi1 zi3], Virgo 室女[Shi4 nu:3], Libra 天秤[Tian1 cheng4], Scorpio 天蠍|天蝎[Tian1 xie1], Sagittarius 人馬|人马[Ren2 ma3], Capricorn 摩羯[Mo2 jie2], Aquarius 寶瓶|宝瓶[Bao3 ping2], Pisces 雙魚|双鱼[Shuang1 yu2]
Pallas, an asteroid, discovered in 1802 by H.W. Olbers
